properties.name: Modern Downtown Condo
properties.description: Stunning modern condo with panoramic city views and premium finishes.
properties.fullDescription: This luxurious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo features floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, and a private balcony with breathtaking city views. Located in the heart of downtown with easy access to restaurants, shopping, and public transportation.

properties.name: Charming Victorian House
properties.description: Historic Victorian home with original details and modern updates.
properties.fullDescription: Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom Victorian house featuring original hardwood floors, ornate moldings, and a renovated kitchen. The home includes a private garden, finished basement, and is located on a tree-lined street in the desirable Brooklyn Heights neighborhood.

properties.name: Townhouse
properties.description: Oceanfront townhouse with private deck and beach access.
properties.fullDescription: Exceptional 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom townhouse just steps from the beach. Features include vaulted ceilings, a gourmet kitchen, master suite with ocean views, private rooftop deck, and direct beach access. Perfect for luxury coastal living.

properties.name: Cozy Studio
properties.description: Efficient studio with modern amenities in trendy neighborhood.
properties.fullDescription: Stylish studio apartment featuring exposed brick walls, high ceilings, updated kitchen with granite countertops, and in-unit washer/dryer. Located in the vibrant Capitol Hill area with easy access to live music venues, restaurants, and nightlife.

properties.name: Suburban Family Home
properties.description: Spacious family home with large yard and excellent schools nearby.
properties.fullDescription: Beautiful 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom family home in a quiet suburban neighborhood. Features include an open floor plan, updated kitchen with island, master suite with walk-in closet, covered patio, and large backyard. Located in top-rated school district.

properties.name: Mountain View Cabin
properties.description: Rustic cabin with stunning mountain views and ski access.
properties.fullDescription: Charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom mountain cabin with panoramic views of the Rocky Mountains. Features include a stone fireplace, vaulted ceilings, wraparound deck, hot tub, and ski-in/ski-out access. Perfect for year-round mountain living or as a vacation retreat.

properties.name: Amaan Land
properties.fullDescription: First come and get the opportunity of 10 % discount.
